channel.title: Business Model Change on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Business Model Change on FinanClub

item.title: 1209 AI
item.description: score:1209 Chances: C3.ai’s guidance for fiscal 2024 suggests that the shift in its business model from a subscription-based one to a consumption-based one is likely to work, which may attract investors looking for growth potential. The company made a strategic change to a pay-as-you-go model to reduce the entry barrier for new customers, leading to quicker deal closures and potential business growth.
